attr.title: Circle Breaker Madness
attr.desc:
Circle Breaker Madness is a brick destroying game. Use balls to destroy the bricks but watch out in this circular playing field, as the ball is always on its way out!
Catch it and send it back into the center on its mission to destroy the bricks.
Simple graphics, catchy music and captivating gameplay with arcade and retro feeling.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Itch.io and copy the place Circle Breaker Madness 1.0.1.exe here.txt into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Itch.io](https://goldenforestgames.itch.io/circle-breaker-madness) and copy the place `Circle Breaker Madness 1.0.1.exe` into the `assets` folder.
